subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal controlled the match with Roger Federer from the start to win his seventh Italian Open title, and Serena Williams won her fourth straight title of the year by defeating Victoria Azarenka.
snippet: Rafael Nadal controlled the match with Roger Federer from the start to win his seventh Italian Open title, and Serena Williams won her fourth straight title of the year by defeating Victoria Azarenka.
